title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements through stakeholder meetings and research.

title: System Architecture Design for NeuroFeedbackTherapist Project (Updated)
description: Update the original description with more specific details about the task. Design the overall system architecture for the NeuroFeedbackTherapist project, encompassing both hardware and software components. Detail data flow, integration points, security considerations, scalability, and performance optimizations for real-time neurofeedback functionality while ensuring patient privacy and data security. Provide comprehensive documentation and diagrams in a clear and concise manner that can be easily understood by all stakeholders. Focus on using modular design principles to facilitate future upgrades and expansions of the system. Incorporate feedback mechanisms for continuous improvement, with special emphasis on creating a user-friendly interface for both patients and clinicians. Also, consider integrating machine learning algorithms for advanced neurofeedback analysis. Upon completion, conduct thorough testing and documentation before moving to implementation stage. Update the rfc_state field to 'READY_FOR_IMPLEMENTATION' once the design is approved.

title: Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) Hardware Selection
description: Research and select the appropriate BCI hardware devices for signal acquisition and processing.

title: Signal Processing and Analysis
description: Develop algorithms and techniques for real-time signal processing, feature extraction, and neurofeedback analysis.

title: User Interface Design (Revised)
description: Design the user interface for both patient and clinician applications. Prioritize usability, accessibility, data visualization, compliance with relevant healthcare regulations and guidelines (e.g., HIPAA, ADA), and consistency with the overall system architecture. Incorporate feedback from User Experience Research and UX/UI best practices for healthcare applications. Ensure the design is scalable and adaptable to future updates or expansions of the system.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a scalable, secure, and HIPAA-compliant database schema for storing patient data, session logs, and system configurations. The schema should be designed to efficiently handle the expected growth in data volume, ensure data integrity, privacy, and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., HIPAA). Include mechanisms for data backup, recovery, and auditing. Consider using encryption at rest and in transit where applicable.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations for handling sensitive patient data.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate all components and perform comprehensive testing, including unit, integration, and end-to-end testing.

title: Deployment and Maintenance
description: Deploy the system to production environments, set up monitoring and logging, and plan for ongoing maintenance and updates.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials for clinicians and support staff.
